page.title: 11MARWOOD S. THE PARISHES
page.content: There are two main parishes in this area,Marwood and Ashford.Marwood church is much larger with a tower and Ashford is very small and with a spire. At Marwood church we walked up 106 steps to the top of the tower and had a good view of Dr.Smart's Gardens.The coat of arms on the wall had just been newly painted.The choir seats were miserichords and if you fell asleep they crashed down with a loud bang! There were at least 60 bright new kneelers in the church which had been made by people in the parish.At the back of the church there is a closed area for little children to play during the service. At Ashford church we noticed most the anchor gravestone.
